params.maxVestingPerWallet: max vestings per wallet for the token.
params.name: The token name.

createATM(string,string,uint8,uint256,ui.return: the new ATM governance instance address.

isATM(address).return: true if the given address is an ATM. Otherwise it returns false.

createATM(string,string,uint8,uint256,ui.notice: It creates a new ATM instance.

getTLRToken(address).notice: Returns the token address of a given associated atm address.

isATM(address).notice: Tests whether an address is an ATM instance or not.
